dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, big news coming out of Kazakhstan this week, something pretty interesting, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, big news coming out of Kazakhstan this week, something pretty interesting, actually.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah? What's got your attention, uh, today?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah? What's got your attention, uh, today?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, Kazakhstan is actually gifting a whole bunch of saiga antelopes to China.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, Kazakhstan is actually gifting a whole bunch of saiga antelopes to China.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan will gift 1,500 saiga antelopes to China to help restore the species there, according to the presidential press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Gifting? Wow. Like, how many are we talking about?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Gifting? Wow. Like, how many are we talking about?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, gifting. Uh, a massive 1,500 of them, actually. According to their presidential press service.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, gifting. Uh, a massive fifteen hundred of them, actually. According to their presidential press service.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan will gift 1,500 saiga antelopes to China to help restore the species there, according to the presidential press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: 1,500? That's a huge number! And for what purpose, like, just a nice gesture?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: fifteen hundred? That's a huge number! And for what purpose, like, just a nice gesture?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, no. It's actually to help restore the species over there in western China. President Tokayev announced it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no. It's actually to help restore the species over there in western China. President Tokayev announced it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev announced the decision to present 1,500 saiga antelopes to the Chinese government for relocation to western China in order to help restore the species in the neighboring country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so a conservation effort. That's, um, that's pretty significant. Did China, like, respond?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so a conservation effort. That's, um, that's pretty significant. Did China, like, respond?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. President Xi Jinping, uh, he expressed his gratitude for the decision.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. President Xi Jinping, uh, he expressed his gratitude for the decision.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In response, Chinese President Xi Jinping expressed his gratitude to President Tokayev for the decision, as China is planning to revive its saiga population,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, 'cause China's, you know, planning to revive their own saiga population, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, 'cause China's, you know, planning to revive their own saiga population, I guess.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In response, Chinese President Xi Jinping expressed his gratitude to President Tokayev for the decision, as China is planning to revive its saiga population,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, that's the whole idea. They're trying to bring them back.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, that's the whole idea. They're trying to bring them back.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But wait a second. [interrupts] Didn't we also hear something, uh, relatively recently about saiga meat?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But wait a second. Didn't we also hear something, uh, relatively recently about saiga meat?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, you're right! Yes, yes. Minister Yerlan Nyssanbayev, he announced that saiga meat would soon be available in retail stores across Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, you're right! Yes, yes. Minister Yerlan Nyssanbayev, he announced that saiga meat would soon be available in retail stores across Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, Minister of Ecology Yerlan Nyssanbayev announced that saiga meat would soon be available in retail stores across Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, on one hand, they're sending 1,500 for conservation, and on the other, they're like, selling the meat?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, on one hand, they're sending fifteen hundred for conservation, and on the other, they're like, selling the meat?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's, um, it's quite the contrast, isn't it? A bit of a complex situation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's, um, it's quite the contrast, isn't it? A bit of a complex situation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. [overlaps] Kind of makes you wonder about the bigger picture there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Kind of makes you wonder about the bigger picture there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It really does. A lot happening with the saiga population, that's for sure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really does. A lot happening with the saiga population, that's for sure.
